articles.headline: Global Oil Prices Surge as OPEC+ Extends Supply Cuts
articles.body: Crude oil rose above $95/bbl after OPEC+ announced extended supply cuts into Q4, stoking inflationary concerns.

articles.headline: Tesla Faces EU Probe Over Subsidies for EV Exports
articles.body: European regulators have launched an investigation into whether Tesla benefited unfairly from US subsidies on exported EVs.

articles.headline: US Jobless Claims Fall, Signaling Labor Market Strength
articles.body: Weekly jobless claims dropped to 200k, the lowest in 6 months, reinforcing views that the US economy remains resilient.
